summary: SummaryErborian Centella Cleansing Balm features the effectiveness of an oil, delivered in the softness of a balm. Adding a sensorial experience as the product melts into skin and ideal for makeup removal, it's formulated with Centella Asiatica, one of their super-star ingredients, for added benefits.
details: DetailsBenefitsEffective, yet gentle - thoroughly cleanse skin without stripping it of its natural oils.Safe to use around the eyes, and encouraged to do so!Goes a step beyond cleansing as it nourishes the skin, setting you up for the rest of your routine.FeaturesMeant to be used as a first-step cleanser, it helps break down the most stubborn makeup - that includes waterproof too.From a solid balm to a silky oil, Centella Cleansing Balm first works hard to start breaking down the day's makeup.Upon working into skin, Centella Cleansing Balm does a final transformation into a rich milky texture as it finishes melting makeup off.Key IngredientsCentella Asiatica, traditionally used for its ultra-soothing and comforting properties, is the star ingredient in this cleanser.Sweet Almond Oil, an oil rich in Vitamin E, softens the skin.Shea Butter, a highly emollient ingredient, intensely nourishes the skin.Item 2599502How To UseGently massage in circular motions on a dry face, including the eyes, then lather into a milky veil with water before rinsing thoroughly.IngredientsHelianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, PEG-40 Sorbitan Peroleate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cera Alba/Beeswax, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Polysorbate 20, Centella Asiatica Extract, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Tocopherol, Parfum/Fragrance.
how_to_use: Gently massage in circular motions on a dry face, including the eyes, then lather into a milky veil with water before rinsing thoroughly.

faceoff_positive.comments: I love the finish of the BB cream. It barely looks like I'm wearing makeup but somehow my imperfections are blurred out and I look glowy but not greasy. It's easy to apply with my fingers or a sponge.     My only gripe is the shade range. The lightest shade, "clair" is a bit too dark on me so I can only apply a very sheer layer or I look orange. I'm sure others will have an issue on the other end of the spectrum as well given that the darkest shade is "caramel". If this came in a lighter shade I would wear it every day!
faceoff_positive.headline: Wider shade range please!

faceoff_negative.comments: I wouldn't see any difference in my skin; very oily; I used to use the charcoal cleansing. It was much better.
faceoff_negative.headline: I wouldn't see any difference
